column1: # Add comments like this. W h i t e s p a c e does not matter.
# Here is what each field is in order:
# 1. Installation method. Can be one of => Pacman/AUR/Suckless/DoomEmacs (defaults to 'Pacman')
# 2. Environment. Can be one of         => All/X11/DWM/Wayland/Hyprland/Extra (defaults to 'All')
# 4. Description. # TODO: Bring all descriptions from the arch repositories.

column4: "A Free Implementation of the Unicode Bidirectional Algorithm."
"a highly customizable dynamic tiling Wayland compositor."
"Turns on the numlock key in X11.."
"A small program for hiding the mouse cursor."
"Provide a simple visual front end for XRandR 1.2.."
"Command line interface to the X11 clipboard."
"NVIDIA Prime Render Offload configuration and utilities."
"Tool for configuring the NVIDIA graphics driver."
"a blazing fast wayland wallpaper utility with IPC controls."
"Highly customizable Wayland bar for Sway and Wlroots based compositors."
"Select a region in a Wayland compositor."
"Low-latency audio/video router and processor - JACK replacement."
"Low-latency audio/video router and processor - PulseAudio replacement."
"Neo (or New or Not) Simple (or Small or Suckless) X Image Viewer."
"Neo (or New or Not) Simple (or Small or Suckless) X Image Viewer."
"a free, open source, and cross-platform media player."
"Lightweight video thumbnailer that can be used by file managers."
"Free, open source software for live streaming and recording."
"Complete solution to record, convert and stream audio and video."
"Development and debugging utilities for the bluetooth protocol stack."
"SSH protocol implementation for remote login, command execution and file transfer."
"Fool ssh into accepting an interactive password non-interactively."
"A hook preloader that allows to redirect TCP traffic of existing dynamically linked programs through one or more SOCKS or HTTP proxies."
"A terminal file manager inspired by ranger."
"Modern, fast and easy-to-use file manager for Xfce."
"Automatic management of removable drives and media for Thunar."
"Thumbnail service implementing the thumbnail management D-Bus specification."
"Virtual filesystem implementation for GIO - MTP backend (Android, media player)."
"PDF support for Zathura (MuPDF backend) (Supports PDF, ePub, and OpenXPS)."
"POSIX compliant shell that aims to be as small as possible."
"A very advanced and programmable command interpreter (shell) for UNIX."
"Bash language server implementation based on Tree Sitter and its grammar for Bash."
"Stores, retrieves, generates, and synchronizes passwords securely."
"Cat clone with syntax highlighting and git integration."
"A modern replacement for ls (community fork of exa)."
"Simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find."
"A search tool that combines the usability of ag with the raw speed of grep."
"A youtube-dl fork with additional features and fixes."
"Lightweight, easy to configure DNS forwarder and DHCP server."
"Linux kernel packet control tool (using nft interface)."
"Desktop user interface for managing virtual machines."
"Typeface family designed for coding, terminal use and technical documents."
"Font family based on the Bitstream Vera Fonts with a wider range of characters."
"Patched font Iosevka from nerd fonts library."
"GTK settings editor adapted to work on wlroots-based compositors."
"Fork of the python-language-server project, maintained by the Spyder IDE team and the community."
"The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages."
"Language Server Protocol (LSP) implementation for TypeScript using tsserver."
"The extensible, customizable, self-documenting real-time display editor."
"A high-level language, primarily intended for numerical computations."
"Utility to detect other OSes on a set of drives."
"A library and program to extract, create, and modify WIM files."
